nodes.text: The Enrivi system was a star system located in the Metatessu sector within the galaxy's Mid Rim. In 3 ABY, two starships of the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry—the CR90 corvette Thunderstrike and the Braha'tok-class gunship Apailana's Promise—were ambushed by forces of the Galactic Empire, consisting of a light cruiser and a squadron of TIE fighters, just thirty hours after escaping a battle in another system. The Imperial forces had followed a hypermatter trail being left by the Thunderstrike's damaged hyperdrive, but were ultimately obliterated in the ensuing battle, with all Imperial personnel being killed. After leaving the Enrivi system, the rebel company discovered that its starships had been tracked.
The Enrivi system appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
